snippet: Employers in 31 states cut jobs last month as weak growth weighed on hiring and cuts in oil and gas drilling caused big job losses in some states.
abstract: Labor Dept reports that 31 states cut jobs in March, as weak economic growth weighed on hiring and a slowdown in oil and gas drilling caused significant cuts in some states.
lead_paragraph: Employers in 31 states cut jobs last month as weak growth weighed on hiring and cuts in oil and gas drilling caused big job losses in some states.

headline.main: Slowdown in Drilling Brings Some Job Cuts
headline.print_headline: Slowdown in Drilling Brings Some Job Cuts
